index.title: RollerCraft
index.content: RollerCraft is a UGC Editor Engine inspired by Rolling Sky where players drag a ball horizontally across the screen over a five-tile-wide stage in order to reach the finish line.

ugc/index.title: UGC
ugc/index.content:
UGC stands for User Generated Content. RollerCraft allows users to create their own levels and upload them to the RollerCraft servers. For more information on how to create your own levels, check out the guides.
This page contains links to important UGC information.
